about_the_game:
TRAILER COMING SOON

Cosmic Coop is the ultimate extraterrestrial creature collector and farming adventure. After crash landing on a mystifying cosmic planet, you'll find yourself surrounded by enigmatic Critterlings with curious affinities. Lure these space creatures to your newly found farm with captivating objects like gleaming altars, radiant lights, various trees and crops, and much more.

Secure their loyalty by building adorable coops, turning your once-alien land into a bustling Critterling haven. As you explore and expand, each discovery becomes a step closer to making this otherworldly place your home.

It's not just about farming; it's about forming cosmic connections. You'll also meet some strange anamorphic creatures to help you on your journey.

Critterlings Snippet!

Features

  • Embark on a Journey: Uncover around 50 unique Critterlings.
  • Craft Harmonious Ecosystems: Strategically design your farm to ensure harmonious living among the Critterlings, avoiding potential conflicts.
  • Defend and Protect: Guard your haven against unpredictable cosmic invaders.
  • Help the locals: Take on quests and solve all the troubles the villagers might face.
  • Crafting Galore: Source materials and innovate with crafting, enhancing your farm with new creations.
  • Engage in Cosmic Chatter: Share whimsical dialogues with the planet's native anamorphic inhabitants.

Inspiration

While creature-collecting is often associated with the Pokémon series, Cosmic Coop actually draws its inspiration from titles like Viva Piñata and Neko Atsume. The creature collection element is very similar to how you meet new creatures in those titles. Cosmic Coop is also inspired by classic farming games such as Harvest Moon, Stardew Valley, and even inspiration from Forager. If you're a fan of any of these games, then Cosmic Coop is sure to resonate with you!
